categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Nar Millich was a Human male major who served as a Security Chief in the Imperial Navy during the early years of the Galactic Civil War. He worked to gain position and power within the Galactic Empire's navy and believed that gaining the Sith Lord Darth Vader's favor was a path to success. Millich had dark hair and fair skin.
The first and only source mentioning Nar Millich is a card in Decipher's 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
